item1: ITEM 1. BUSINESS Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc., Delaware corporation, together its subsidiaries (“Chipotle,” “we,” “us,” “our”) owns operates Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants, which feature relevant menu burritos, burrito bowls (a burrito without tortilla), quesadillas, tacos, salads. strive cultivate better world serving responsibly sourced, classically cooked, real food wholesome ingredients without artificial colors, flavors preservatives. passionate about providing great guest experience making food more accessible everyone while continuing brand demonstrated purpose.
item7: (dollars millions) Provision income taxes Effective income tax rate effective income tax rate decreased 0.5% year ended December 31, 2024 compared year ended December 31, 2023, primarily due lower nondeductible expenses 0.6% income tax reserves 0.4%. These decreases partially offset 0.6% reduction tax benefits related option exercise equity vesting. Quarterly Financial Data/Seasonality Seasonal factors cause profitability fluctuate quarter quarter. Historically, average daily restaurant sales net income lower first fourth quarters due, part, holiday season because fewer people eat out during periods inclement weather (the winter months) than during periods mild warm weather (the spring, summer fall months).
